author: David R Thompson

review: Very easy to use. I am a total technical moron when it comes to these things and I was worried about lengthy technical calls to someone overseas reading from scrips but setup was super simple and uncomplicated and I got it going within 20 min. Streaming has been very good. I plug this into an Epson compatible projector and we have watched numerous movies on a large screen through the Amazon streaming service. The remote is straight forward and does not suffer from the 100-button syndrome. It would be nice if the remote had lighted keys for dark operation, but not a biggie.

review: Excellent price for an excellent product.  I bought this for my daughter.  We have the regular Roku on the living room TV.  I'll be buying another of these if we add a second TV set in this house.
author: D. J. Taylor

review: This was our second Roku, the first being a Roku 2.  We purchased this one the first week of November and returned it about a week ago.  It began reloading over & over again about every 2 minutes and finally we just got a grey screen.  Amazon has amazing customer service and we only had to put it in a padded envelope & put it on the front porch for UPS to pick up.  We have had the Roku 2 for a couple of years now & it works like a charm.  We probably won't replace with another Stick, probably a Roku 3.

review: I like this Roku alot.  It would have been very easy to get started if I had known how to set it up right. I didn't know and I was on the phone for the 3rd time with the cable company before I found I was setting it on the wrong thingy.  I'm not a wizard  I should have had one of the kids do it instead I had to wait for my son.  Waited a while.  Still need some directions about channels.
